import numpy as np

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
df = pd.read_csv('china_investment_tracker.csv')

# æ¸…æ´—æŠ•èµ„é‡‘é¢åˆ—

print("=" * 80)
print("ä¸­å›½å¯¹å¤–æŠ•èµ„æ•°æ® - æ¢ç´¢æ€§åˆ†æç»“æœ")

print(f"  æœ€å°æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${df['Millions_clean'].min():,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
print(f"  æœ€å¤§æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${df['Millions_clean'].max():,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")

def classify_investment(amount):
    if pd.isna(amount):
        return 'Unknown'
    elif amount < 100:
        return 'Small (<100M)'
    elif amount < 500:
        return 'Medium (100-500M)'
    elif amount < 1000:
        return 'Large (500M-1B)'
    else:
        return 'Very Large (>1B)'

import pandas as pd
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
df = pd.read_csv('china_investment_tracker.csv')

# æ¸…æ´—æŠ•èµ„é‡‘é¢åˆ—
df['Millions_clean'] = df['Millions'].str.replace('\$', '', regex=True).str.replace(',', '').str.strip()
df['Millions_clean'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Millions_clean'], errors='coerce')

print('=' * 80)
print('ä¸­å›½å¯¹å¤–æŠ•èµ„æ•°æ® - æ¢ç´¢æ€§åˆ†æç»“æœ')
print('=' * 80)

# åŸºæœ¬ç»Ÿè®¡
print('\nã€1. æ•°æ®æ¦‚è§ˆã€‘')
print(f'  æ€»æŠ•èµ„è®°å½•: {len(df):,} æ¡')
print(f'  æ—¶é—´è·¨åº¦: {df[\"Year\"].min()} - {df[\"Year\"].max()}')
print(f'  ç´¯è®¡æŠ•èµ„æ€»é¢: \${df[\"Millions_clean\"].sum():,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ')
print(f'  å¹³å‡æŠ•èµ„é¢: \${df[\"Millions_clean\"].mean():,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ')
print(f'  ä¸­ä½æ•°æŠ•èµ„é¢: \${df[\"Millions_clean\"].median():,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ')

# è¡Œä¸šç»Ÿè®¡
print('\nã€2. Top 10 æŠ•èµ„è¡Œä¸šã€‘')
sector_stats = df.groupby('Sector')['Millions_clean'].agg(['sum', 'count']).round(2)
sector_stats.columns = ['æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢', 'é¡¹ç›®æ•°']
sector_stats = sector_stats.sort_values('æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢', ascending=False).head(10)
for idx, (sector, row) in enumerate(sector_stats.iterrows(), 1):
    print(f'  {idx}. {sector}: \${row[\"æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢\"]:,.2f}M ({int(row[\"é¡¹ç›®æ•°\"])}é¡¹)')

# åœ°åŒºç»Ÿè®¡
print('\nã€3. Top 10 æŠ•èµ„åœ°åŒºã€‘')
region_stats = df.groupby('Region')['Millions_clean'].agg(['sum', 'count']).round(2)
region_stats.columns = ['æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢', 'é¡¹ç›®æ•°']
region_stats = region_stats.sort_values('æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢', ascending=False).head(10)
for idx, (region, row) in enumerate(region_stats.iterrows(), 1):
    print(f'  {idx}. {region}: \${row[\"æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢\"]:,.2f}M ({int(row[\"é¡¹ç›®æ•°\"])}é¡¹)')

# å›½å®¶ç»Ÿè®¡
print('\nã€4. Top 10 æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶ã€‘')
country_stats = df.groupby('Country')['Millions_clean'].agg(['sum', 'count']).round(2)
country_stats.columns = ['æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢', 'é¡¹ç›®æ•°']
country_stats = country_stats.sort_values('æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢', ascending=False).head(10)
for idx, (country, row) in enumerate(country_stats.iterrows(), 1):
    print(f'  {idx}. {country}: \${row[\"æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢\"]:,.2f}M ({int(row[\"é¡¹ç›®æ•°\"])}é¡¹)')

print('\n' + '=' * 80)

<details><summary>Tool use: **command** â€¢ Run command: cd /Users/qrebecca/china_investment_tracker && python3 << 'PYEOF'
import csv
import re
from collections import defaultdict

print("=" * 80)
print("ä¸­å›½å¯¹å¤–æŠ•èµ„æ•°æ® - æ¢ç´¢æ€§åˆ†æç»“æœ")
print("=" * 80)

# è¯»å–CSVæ–‡ä»¶
with open('china_investment_tracker.csv', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    reader = csv.DictReader(f)
    data = list(reader)

print(f"\nã€1. æ•°æ®æ¦‚è§ˆã€‘")
print(f"  æ€»æŠ•èµ„è®°å½•: {len(data):,} æ¡")

# æ¸…æ´—é‡‘é¢æ•°æ®
amounts = []
years = []
sectors = defaultdict(lambda: {'count': 0, 'amount': 0})
regions = defaultdict(lambda: {'count': 0, 'amount': 0})
countries = defaultdict(lambda: {'count': 0, 'amount': 0})
investors = defaultdict(lambda: {'count': 0, 'amount': 0})

for row in data:
    # å¤„ç†å¹´ä»½
    if row['Year']:
        years.append(int(row['Year']))
    
    # å¤„ç†é‡‘é¢
    amount_str = row['Millions'].replace('$', '').replace(',', '').strip()
    try:
        amount = float(amount_str)
        amounts.append(amount)
        
        # æŒ‰è¡Œä¸šç»Ÿè®¡
        if row['Sector']:
            sectors[row['Sector']]['count'] += 1
            sectors[row['Sector']]['amount'] += amount
        
        # æŒ‰åœ°åŒºç»Ÿè®¡
        if row['Region']:
            regions[row['Region']]['count'] += 1
            regions[row['Region']]['amount'] += amount
        
        # æŒ‰å›½å®¶ç»Ÿè®¡
        if row['Country']:
            countries[row['Country']]['count'] += 1
            countries[row['Country']]['amount'] += amount
        
        # æŒ‰æŠ•èµ„è€…ç»Ÿè®¡
        if row['Investor']:
            investors[row['Investor']]['count'] += 1
            investors[row['Investor']]['amount'] += amount
    except:
        pass

print(f"  æ—¶é—´è·¨åº¦: {min(years)} - {max(years)}")
print(f"  ç´¯è®¡æŠ•èµ„æ€»é¢: ${sum(amounts):,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ (â‰ˆ ${sum(amounts)/1000:.2f} åäº¿ç¾å…ƒ)")
print(f"  å¹³å‡æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${sum(amounts)/len(amounts):,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
print(f"  ä¸­ä½æ•°æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${sorted(amounts)[len(amounts)//2]:,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
print(f"  æœ€å¤§å•ç¬”æŠ•èµ„: ${max(amounts):,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
print(f"  æœ€å°æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${min(amounts):,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")

# Top 10 è¡Œä¸š
print(f"\nã€2. Top 10 æŠ•èµ„è¡Œä¸šã€‘")
sorted_sectors = sorted(sectors.items(), key=lambda x: x[1]['amount'], reverse=True)[:10]
for idx, (sector, stats) in enumerate(sorted_sectors, 1):
    print(f"  {idx}. {sector}: ${stats['amount']:,.2f}M ({stats['count']}é¡¹)")

# Top 10 åœ°åŒº
print(f"\nã€3. Top 10 æŠ•èµ„åœ°åŒºã€‘")
sorted_regions = sorted(regions.items(), key=lambda x: x[1]['amount'], reverse=True)[:10]
for idx, (region, stats) in enumerate(sorted_regions, 1):
    print(f"  {idx}. {region}: ${stats['amount']:,.2f}M ({stats['count']}é¡¹)")

# Top 10 å›½å®¶
print(f"\nã€4. Top 10 æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶ã€‘")
sorted_countries = sorted(countries.items(), key=lambda x: x[1]['amount'], reverse=True)[:10]
for idx, (country, stats) in enumerate(sorted_countries, 1):
    print(f"  {idx}. {country}: ${stats['amount']:,.2f}M ({stats['count']}é¡¹)")

# Top 10 æŠ•èµ„è€…
print(f"\nã€5. Top 10 æŠ•èµ„è€…ã€‘")
sorted_investors = sorted(investors.items(), key=lambda x: x[1]['amount'], reverse=True)[:10]
for idx, (investor, stats) in enumerate(sorted_investors, 1):
    print(f"  {idx}. {investor}: ${stats['amount']:,.2f}M ({stats['count']}é¡¹)")

# æŠ•èµ„è§„æ¨¡åˆ†ç±»
small = sum(1 for a in amounts if a < 100)
medium = sum(1 for a in amounts if 100 <= a < 500)
large = sum(1 for a in amounts if 500 <= a < 1000)
very_large = sum(1 for a in amounts if a >= 1000)

print(f"\nã€6. æŠ•èµ„è§„æ¨¡åˆ†ç±»ã€‘")
print(f"  å°å‹æŠ•èµ„ (<100M): {small} é¡¹ ({small/len(amounts)*100:.1f}%)")
print(f"  ä¸­å‹æŠ•èµ„ (100-500M): {medium} é¡¹ ({medium/len(amounts)*100:.1f}%)")
print(f"  å¤§å‹æŠ•èµ„ (500M-1B): {large} é¡¹ ({large/len(amounts)*100:.1f}%)")
print(f"  è¶…å¤§å‹æŠ•èµ„ (>1B): {very_large} é¡¹ ({very_large/len(amounts)*100:.1f}%)")

# å¹´åº¦è¶‹åŠ¿ï¼ˆæœ€è¿‘10å¹´ï¼‰
print(f"\nã€7. æœ€è¿‘10å¹´æŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿ã€‘")
year_stats = defaultdict(lambda: {'count': 0, 'amount': 0})
for row in data:
    if row['Year']:
        year = int(row['Year'])
        year_stats[year]['count'] += 1
        amount_str = row['Millions'].replace('$', '').replace(',', '').strip()
        try:
            year_stats[year]['amount'] += float(amount_str)
        except:
            pass

recent_years = sorted(year_stats.keys())[-10:]
for year in recent_years:
    stats = year_stats[year]
    print(f"  {year}: ${stats['amount']:,.2f}M ({stats['count']}é¡¹)")

print("\n" + "=" * 80)
print("âœ¨ å®Œæ•´çš„å¯è§†åŒ–åˆ†æè¯·åœ¨ Jupyter Notebook ä¸­æ‰“å¼€ eda_analysis.ipynb")
print("   å‘½ä»¤: jupyter notebook eda_analysis.ipynb")
print("=" * 80)

import csv
import re
from collections import defaultdict
import json

print("=" * 80)
print("ã€è¡Œä¸šæ·±åº¦æŒ–æ˜ - ä¸ºåŸ¹è®­å‡†å¤‡ã€‘")
print("=" * 80)

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
with open('china_investment_tracker.csv', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    reader = csv.DictReader(f)
    data = list(reader)

# å®šä¹‰è¡Œä¸šå…³é”®è¯æ˜ å°„
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'tsmc', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'hospital', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['ai', 'artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'neural network', 'computer vision', 'nlp'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'car', 'vehicle', 'tesla', 'nio', 'byd'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_industry(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matched = []
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matched.append(industry)
                break
    return matched if matched else []

# åˆ†ç±»æ‰€æœ‰è®°å½•
industry_data = {industry: [] for industry in industry_keywords.keys()}

for row in data:
    industries = classify_industry(row)
    for industry in industries:
        industry_data[industry].append(row)

# åˆ†ææ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸š
print("\n" + "=" * 80)
print("ã€ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šè¡Œä¸šæ ·æœ¬ç»Ÿè®¡ã€‘")
print("=" * 80)

for industry, rows in industry_data.items():
    print(f"\n{industry}:")
    print(f"  åŒ¹é…åˆ°çš„æŠ•èµ„è®°å½•æ•°: {len(rows)}")
    
    # è®¡ç®—æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢
    amounts = []
    for row in rows:
        try:
            amount = float(row['Millions'].replace('$', '').replace(',', '').strip())
            amounts.append(amount)
        except:
            pass
    
    if amounts:
        print(f"  æ€»æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${sum(amounts):,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
        print(f"  å¹³å‡æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${sum(amounts)/len(amounts):,.2f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")

# ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šç”Ÿæˆç›®çš„åœ°åˆ†å¸ƒ
print("\n" + "=" * 80)
print("ã€ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šå„è¡Œä¸šç›®çš„åœ°åˆ†å¸ƒï¼ˆTop 10å›½å®¶ï¼‰ã€‘")
print("=" * 80)

for industry, rows in industry_data.items():
    if len(rows) == 0:
        print(f"\nâŒ {industry}: æ— æ•°æ®")
        continue
    
    print(f"\n{'='*60}")
    print(f"ã€{industry}ã€‘")
    print(f"{'='*60}")
    
    # ç»Ÿè®¡å›½å®¶åˆ†å¸ƒ
    country_stats = defaultdict(lambda: {'count': 0, 'amount': 0, 'projects': []})
    
    for row in rows:
        country = row.get('Country', '').strip()
        if not country:
            continue
        
        try:
            amount = float(row['Millions'].replace('$', '').replace(',', '').strip())
            country_stats[country]['count'] += 1
            country_stats[country]['amount'] += amount
            country_stats[country]['projects'].append({
                'year': row.get('Year', ''),
                'investor': row.get('Investor', ''),
                'target': row.get('Partner/Target', ''),
                'amount': amount
            })
        except:
            pass
    
    # æŒ‰æŠ•èµ„é¢æ’åº
    sorted_countries = sorted(country_stats.items(), 
                             key=lambda x: x[1]['amount'], 
                             reverse=True)[:10]
    
    print("\næŒ‰æŠ•èµ„é‡‘é¢æ’åºï¼š")
    print(f"{'æ’å':<4} {'å›½å®¶':<20} {'æŠ•èµ„é¢(ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ)':<20} {'é¡¹ç›®æ•°':<8} {'å æ¯”'}")
    print("-" * 70)
    
    total_amount = sum([v['amount'] for v in country_stats.values()])
    
    for idx, (country, stats) in enumerate(sorted_countries, 1):
        percentage = (stats['amount'] / total_amount * 100) if total_amount > 0 else 0
        print(f"{idx:<4} {country:<20} ${stats['amount']:>15,.2f}  {stats['count']:<8} {percentage:>5.1f}%")
    
    # æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸€äº›å…¸å‹é¡¹ç›®
    if sorted_countries:
        print(f"\nğŸ“Œ {sorted_countries[0][0]} çš„å…¸å‹é¡¹ç›®ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š")
        top_country = sorted_countries[0][0]
        top_projects = sorted(country_stats[top_country]['projects'], 
                            key=lambda x: x['amount'], 
                            reverse=True)[:3]
        for p in top_projects:
            print(f"   â€¢ {p['year']} - {p['investor'][:40]} â†’ {p['target'][:40]}")
            print(f"     æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${p['amount']:,.2f}M")

print("\n" + "=" * 80)
print("ã€åˆ†æå®Œæˆã€‘")
print("=" * 80)
print("\nğŸ’¡ è¯´æ˜ï¼š")
print("  - é›†æˆç”µè·¯ã€ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯ã€AI å¦‚æœæ ·æœ¬è¾ƒå°‘ï¼Œå±æ­£å¸¸ç°è±¡")
print("  - è¿™äº›æ˜¯æ–°å…´è¡Œä¸šï¼Œå†å²æ•°æ®åå‘ä¼ ç»Ÿè¡Œä¸š")
print("  - å¯ä»¥ç”¨ç°æœ‰æ•°æ®ä½œä¸ºã€Œä¼ ç»ŸæŠ•èµ„æ¨¡å¼ã€å¯¹æ¯”")
print("  - æ–°å…´è¡Œä¸šçš„é£é™©ç‰¹å¾éœ€è¦ç»“åˆæœ€æ–°æ”¿ç­–è¡¥å……")

df['Amount'] = df['Millions'].str.replace('$', '', regex=False).str.replace(',', '').str.strip()
df['Amount'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Amount'], errors='coerce')

print(f"\nâœ… æ•°æ®åŠ è½½å®Œæˆ: {len(df)} æ¡è®°å½•")

# å®šä¹‰è¡Œä¸šå…³é”®è¯
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'hospital', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['ai', 'artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'software'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'car', 'vehicle', 'byd'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_industry(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matched = []
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matched.append(industry)
                break
    return matched if matched else []

# åˆ†ç±»
df['Industries'] = df.apply(classify_industry, axis=1)
df_expanded = df.explode('Industries')
df_expanded = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'].notna()]

industries = list(industry_keywords.keys())

print(f"âœ… è¡Œä¸šåˆ†ç±»å®Œæˆ")

# ============================================================================
# 1. ç”ŸæˆæŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾
# ============================================================================
print("\n[1/6] ç”ŸæˆæŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾...")

fig, axes = plt.subplots(3, 2, figsize=(18, 15))
axes = axes.flatten()

for idx, industry in enumerate(industries):
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    yearly = industry_df.groupby('Year').agg({
        'Amount': ['sum', 'count']
    }).fillna(0)
    yearly.columns = ['æŠ•èµ„é¢', 'é¡¹ç›®æ•°']
    
    ax = axes[idx]
    ax2 = ax.twinx()
    
    ax.bar(yearly.index, yearly['æŠ•èµ„é¢'], alpha=0.6, color='steelblue', label='Investment Amount')
    ax.set_xlabel('Year', fontsize=11)
    ax.set_ylabel('Investment (Million USD)', fontsize=11, color='steelblue')
    ax.tick_params(axis='y', labelcolor='steelblue')
    
    ax2.plot(yearly.index, yearly['é¡¹ç›®æ•°'], color='red', marker='o', linewidth=2, label='Project Count')
    ax2.set_ylabel('Number of Projects', fontsize=11, color='red')
    ax2.tick_params(axis='y', labelcolor='red')
    
    ax.set_title(f'{industry} - Investment Trend', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold')
    ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
    ax.tick_params(axis='x', rotation=45)

fig.delaxes(axes[5])
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('1_è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.close()

print("   âœ… 1_è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾.png")

# ============================================================================
# 2. ç”Ÿæˆåœ°ç†åˆ†å¸ƒå›¾
# ============================================================================
print("[2/6] ç”Ÿæˆåœ°ç†åˆ†å¸ƒå›¾...")

fig, axes = plt.subplots(3, 2, figsize=(18, 15))
axes = axes.flatten()

for idx, industry in enumerate(industries):
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country').agg({
        'Amount': ['sum', 'count']
    })
    country_stats.columns = ['æŠ•èµ„é¢', 'é¡¹ç›®æ•°']
    country_stats = country_stats.sort_values('æŠ•èµ„é¢', ascending=True).tail(10)
    
    ax = axes[idx]
    bars = ax.barh(range(len(country_stats)), country_stats['æŠ•èµ„é¢'], color='teal')
    ax.set_yticks(range(len(country_stats)))
    ax.set_yticklabels(country_stats.index, fontsize=10)
    ax.set_xlabel('Investment (Million USD)', fontsize=11)
    ax.set_title(f'{industry} - Top 10 Destinations', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold')
    
    for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars, country_stats['æŠ•èµ„é¢'])):
        projects = int(country_stats['é¡¹ç›®æ•°'].iloc[i])
        ax.text(value, i, f' ${value:,.0f}M ({projects})', va='center', fontsize=9)
    
    ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3, axis='x')

fig.delaxes(axes[5])
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('2_è¡Œä¸šåœ°ç†åˆ†å¸ƒå›¾.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.close()

print("   âœ… 2_è¡Œä¸šåœ°ç†åˆ†å¸ƒå›¾.png")

# ============================================================================
# 3. ç”ŸæˆæŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦åˆ†æ
# ============================================================================
print("[3/6] ç”ŸæˆæŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦åˆ†æ...")

concentration_data = []

for industry in industries:
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].sum().sort_values(ascending=False)
    total_amount = country_stats.sum()
    
    if total_amount == 0:
        continue
    
    shares = (country_stats / total_amount * 100)
    hhi = (shares ** 2).sum()
    top3_share = shares.head(3).sum()
    top5_share = shares.head(5).sum()
    
    concentration_data.append({
        'è¡Œä¸š': industry,
        'HHIæŒ‡æ•°': hhi,
        'Top3å æ¯”(%)': top3_share,
        'Top5å æ¯”(%)': top5_share,
        'æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ•°': len(country_stats),
        'ç¬¬ä¸€ç›®çš„åœ°': country_stats.index[0] if len(country_stats) > 0 else '',
        'ç¬¬ä¸€å æ¯”(%)': shares.iloc[0] if len(shares) > 0 else 0
    })

concentration_df = pd.DataFrame(concentration_data)

fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(16, 6))

# HHIæŒ‡æ•°
ax1 = axes[0]
bars1 = ax1.barh(concentration_df['è¡Œä¸š'], concentration_df['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'], color='coral')
ax1.set_xlabel('HHI Index', fontsize=12)
ax1.set_title('Investment Concentration (HHI Index)', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold')
ax1.axvline(x=1000, color='green', linestyle='--', alpha=0.7, label='Low threshold')
ax1.axvline(x=1800, color='red', linestyle='--', alpha=0.7, label='High threshold')
ax1.legend()
ax1.grid(True, alpha=0.3, axis='x')

for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars1, concentration_df['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'])):
    ax1.text(value, i, f' {value:.0f}', va='center', fontsize=10)

# Top3å æ¯”
ax2 = axes[1]
bars2 = ax2.barh(concentration_df['è¡Œä¸š'], concentration_df['Top3å æ¯”(%)'], color='steelblue')
ax2.set_xlabel('Percentage (%)', fontsize=12)
ax2.set_title('Top 3 Destinations Share', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold')
ax2.axvline(x=50, color='orange', linestyle='--', alpha=0.7, label='50% reference')
ax2.legend()
ax2.grid(True, alpha=0.3, axis='x')

for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars2, concentration_df['Top3å æ¯”(%)'])):
    ax2.text(value, i, f' {value:.1f}%', va='center', fontsize=10)

plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('3_æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦åˆ†æ.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.close()

print("   âœ… 3_æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦åˆ†æ.png")

# ============================================================================
# 4. ç”Ÿæˆä¸»è¦æŠ•èµ„è€…åˆ†æ
# ============================================================================
print("[4/6] ç”Ÿæˆä¸»è¦æŠ•èµ„è€…åˆ†æ...")

fig, axes = plt.subplots(3, 2, figsize=(18, 15))
axes = axes.flatten()

for idx, industry in enumerate(industries):
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    investor_stats = industry_df.groupby('Investor').agg({
        'Amount': ['sum', 'count']
    })
    investor_stats.columns = ['æŠ•èµ„é¢', 'é¡¹ç›®æ•°']
    investor_stats = investor_stats.sort_values('æŠ•èµ„é¢', ascending=True).tail(10)
    
    ax = axes[idx]
    bars = ax.barh(range(len(investor_stats)), investor_stats['æŠ•èµ„é¢'], color='darkgreen')
    ax.set_yticks(range(len(investor_stats)))
    labels = [name[:35] + '...' if len(name) > 35 else name for name in investor_stats.index]
    ax.set_yticklabels(labels, fontsize=9)
    ax.set_xlabel('Investment (Million USD)', fontsize=11)
    ax.set_title(f'{industry} - Top 10 Investors', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold')
    
    for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars, investor_stats['æŠ•èµ„é¢'])):
        ax.text(value, i, f' ${value:,.0f}M', va='center', fontsize=8)
    
    ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3, axis='x')

fig.delaxes(axes[5])
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('4_è¡Œä¸šä¸»è¦æŠ•èµ„è€….png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.close()

print("   âœ… 4_è¡Œä¸šä¸»è¦æŠ•èµ„è€….png")

with pd.ExcelWriter('5_å„è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ®.xlsx', engine='openpyxl') as writer:
    # æ±‡æ€»è¡¨
    concentration_df.to_excel(writer, sheet_name='æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦æ±‡æ€»', index=False)
    
    # æ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šçš„è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ®
    for industry in industries:
        industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry].copy()
        export_cols = ['Year', 'Month', 'Investor', 'Amount', 'Partner/Target',

        industry_export = industry_df[export_cols].sort_values('Amount', ascending=False)
        sheet_name = industry[:30]
        industry_export.to_excel(writer, sheet_name=sheet_name, index=False)

for industry in industries:
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    training_content.append("\n" + "="*60)
    training_content.append(f"ã€{industry}ã€‘")
    training_content.append("="*60)
    
    total_amount = industry_df['Amount'].sum()
    total_projects = len(industry_df)
    avg_amount = industry_df['Amount'].mean()
    
    training_content.append(f"\nä¸€ã€æŠ•èµ„æ¦‚å†µ")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ å†å²æŠ•èµ„æ€»é¢: ${total_amount:,.0f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ æŠ•èµ„é¡¹ç›®æ•°: {total_projects} ä¸ª")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ å¹³å‡å•ç¬”æŠ•èµ„: ${avg_amount:,.0f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
    
    # Top 5ç›®çš„åœ°
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].agg(['sum', 'count']).sort_values('sum', ascending=False).head(5)
    total_country_amount = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].sum().sum()
    
    training_content.append(f"\näºŒã€ä¸»è¦æŠ•èµ„ç›®çš„åœ°ï¼ˆTop 5ï¼‰")
    for idx, (country, row) in enumerate(country_stats.iterrows(), 1):
        percentage = (row['sum'] / total_country_amount * 100) if total_country_amount > 0 else 0
        training_content.append(f"  {idx}. {country}")
        training_content.append(f"     æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${row['sum']:,.0f}M ({percentage:.1f}%) | é¡¹ç›®æ•°: {int(row['count'])}")
    
    # é›†ä¸­åº¦
    conc_row = concentration_df[concentration_df['è¡Œä¸š'] == industry]
    if len(conc_row) > 0:
        conc_row = conc_row.iloc[0]
        training_content.append(f"\nä¸‰ã€æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦")
        concentration_level = 'é«˜' if conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'] > 1800 else 'ä¸­' if conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'] > 1000 else 'ä½'
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ HHIæŒ‡æ•°: {conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°']:.0f} ({concentration_level}é›†ä¸­åº¦)")
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ Top3å›½å®¶å æ¯”: {conc_row['Top3å æ¯”(%)']:.1f}%")
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ€»æ•°: {int(conc_row['æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ•°'])}")
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ é£é™©æç¤º: {'æŠ•èµ„è¿‡äºé›†ä¸­ï¼Œåœ°ç¼˜æ”¿æ²»é£é™©è¾ƒé«˜' if concentration_level == 'é«˜' else 'æŠ•èµ„ç›¸å¯¹åˆ†æ•£' if concentration_level == 'ä½' else 'æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦é€‚ä¸­'}")
    
    # å…¸å‹æŠ•èµ„å¯¹è±¡
    training_content.append(f"\nå››ã€å…¸å‹æŠ•èµ„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆPartner/Targetï¼‰")
    partner_stats = industry_df[industry_df['Partner/Target'].notna()].nlargest(3, 'Amount')[['Partner/Target', 'Amount', 'Country', 'Year']]
    for idx, row in partner_stats.iterrows():
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ {row['Partner/Target'][:50]}")
        training_content.append(f"    é‡‘é¢: ${row['Amount']:,.0f}M | å›½å®¶: {row['Country']} | å¹´ä»½: {int(row['Year'])}")
    
    training_content.append(f"\näº”ã€å…¸å‹é£é™©ç±»å‹ï¼ˆè¯·æ ¹æ®ç›®çš„åœ°è¡¥å……ï¼‰")
    training_content.append(f"  é’ˆå¯¹ä¸»è¦ç›®çš„åœ°çš„é£é™©åˆ†æï¼š")
    for idx, (country, row) in enumerate(country_stats.head(3).iterrows(), 1):
        training_content.append(f"\n  {idx}. {country}")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] åœ°ç¼˜æ”¿æ²»é£é™©: ____________")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] ç›‘ç®¡åˆè§„é£é™©: ____________")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] æŠ€æœ¯/çŸ¥è¯†äº§æƒé£é™©: ____________")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] å…¶ä»–é£é™©: ____________")
    
    training_content.append(f"\nå…­ã€å…¸å‹æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼ˆå¾…è¡¥å……ï¼‰")
    training_content.append(f"  æ¡ˆä¾‹1ï¼šæˆåŠŸæ¡ˆä¾‹")
    training_content.append(f"    - æ¡ˆä¾‹åç§°: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - æŠ•èµ„æ–¹: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - ç›®æ ‡æ–¹: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - æŠ•èµ„é‡‘é¢: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - å…³é”®æˆåŠŸå› ç´ : ____________")
    training_content.append(f"  ")
    training_content.append(f"  æ¡ˆä¾‹2ï¼šå¤±è´¥/æŒ‘æˆ˜æ¡ˆä¾‹")
    training_content.append(f"    - æ¡ˆä¾‹åç§°: ____________")

    training_content.append(f"    - ç»éªŒæ•™è®­: ____________")

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from collections import defaultdict
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# è®¾ç½®ä¸­æ–‡å­—ä½“
plt.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['Arial Unicode MS', 'SimHei']  
plt.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False
sns.set_style('whitegrid')

print("="*80)
print("å¼€å§‹ç”ŸæˆåŸ¹è®­ç´ æ...")
print("="*80)

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
df = pd.read_csv('china_investment_tracker.csv')
df['Amount'] = df['Millions'].str.replace('$', '', regex=False).str.replace(',', '').str.strip()
df['Amount'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Amount'], errors='coerce')

print(f"\nâœ… æ•°æ®åŠ è½½å®Œæˆ: {len(df)} æ¡è®°å½•")

# å®šä¹‰è¡Œä¸šå…³é”®è¯
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'hospital', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['ai', 'artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'software'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'car', 'vehicle', 'byd'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_industry(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matched = []
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matched.append(industry)
                break
    return matched if matched else []

# åˆ†ç±»
df['Industries'] = df.apply(classify_industry, axis=1)
df_expanded = df.explode('Industries')
df_expanded = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'].notna()]

industries = list(industry_keywords.keys())

print(f"âœ… è¡Œä¸šåˆ†ç±»å®Œæˆ")

# ============================================================================
# 1. ç”ŸæˆæŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾
# ============================================================================
print("\n[1/6] ç”ŸæˆæŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾...")

fig, axes = plt.subplots(3, 2, figsize=(18, 15))
axes = axes.flatten()

for idx, industry in enumerate(industries):
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    yearly = industry_df.groupby('Year').agg({
        'Amount': ['sum', 'count']
    }).fillna(0)
    yearly.columns = ['æŠ•èµ„é¢', 'é¡¹ç›®æ•°']
    
    ax = axes[idx]
    ax2 = ax.twinx()
    
    ax.bar(yearly.index, yearly['æŠ•èµ„é¢'], alpha=0.6, color='steelblue', label='Investment Amount')
    ax.set_xlabel('Year', fontsize=11)
    ax.set_ylabel('Investment (Million USD)', fontsize=11, color='steelblue')
    ax.tick_params(axis='y', labelcolor='steelblue')
    
    ax2.plot(yearly.index, yearly['é¡¹ç›®æ•°'], color='red', marker='o', linewidth=2, label='Project Count')
    ax2.set_ylabel('Number of Projects', fontsize=11, color='red')
    ax2.tick_params(axis='y', labelcolor='red')
    
    ax.set_title(f'{industry} - Investment Trend', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold')
    ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
    ax.tick_params(axis='x', rotation=45)

fig.delaxes(axes[5])
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('1_è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.close()

print("   âœ… 1_è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾.png")

fig, axes = plt.subplots(3, 2, figsize=(18, 15))
axes = axes.flatten()

for idx, industry in enumerate(industries):
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country').agg({
        'Amount': ['sum', 'count']
    })
    country_stats.columns = ['æŠ•èµ„é¢', 'é¡¹ç›®æ•°']
    country_stats = country_stats.sort_values('æŠ•èµ„é¢', ascending=True).tail(10)
    
    ax = axes[idx]
    bars = ax.barh(range(len(country_stats)), country_stats['æŠ•èµ„é¢'], color='teal')
    ax.set_yticks(range(len(country_stats)))
    ax.set_yticklabels(country_stats.index, fontsize=10)
    ax.set_xlabel('Investment (Million USD)', fontsize=11)
    ax.set_title(f'{industry} - Top 10 Destinations', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold')
    
    for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars, country_stats['æŠ•èµ„é¢'])):
        projects = int(country_stats['é¡¹ç›®æ•°'].iloc[i])
        ax.text(value, i, f' ${value:,.0f}M ({projects})', va='center', fontsize=9)
    
    ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3, axis='x')

fig.delaxes(axes[5])
plt.tight_layout()

print("   âœ… 2_è¡Œä¸šåœ°ç†åˆ†å¸ƒå›¾.png")

# ============================================================================
print("[3/6] ç”ŸæˆæŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦åˆ†æ...")

concentration_data = []

for industry in industries:
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].sum().sort_values(ascending=False)
    total_amount = country_stats.sum()
    
    if total_amount == 0:
        continue
    
    shares = (country_stats / total_amount * 100)
    hhi = (shares ** 2).sum()
    top3_share = shares.head(3).sum()
    top5_share = shares.head(5).sum()
    
    concentration_data.append({
        'è¡Œä¸š': industry,
        'HHIæŒ‡æ•°': hhi,
        'Top3å æ¯”(%)': top3_share,
        'Top5å æ¯”(%)': top5_share,
        'æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ•°': len(country_stats),
        'ç¬¬ä¸€ç›®çš„åœ°': country_stats.index[0] if len(country_stats) > 0 else '',
        'ç¬¬ä¸€å æ¯”(%)': shares.iloc[0] if len(shares) > 0 else 0
    })

concentration_df = pd.DataFrame(concentration_data)

fig, axes = plt.subplots(1, 2, figsize=(16, 6))

# HHIæŒ‡æ•°
ax1 = axes[0]
bars1 = ax1.barh(concentration_df['è¡Œä¸š'], concentration_df['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'], color='coral')
ax1.set_xlabel('HHI Index', fontsize=12)
ax1.set_title('Investment Concentration (HHI Index)', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold')
ax1.axvline(x=1000, color='green', linestyle='--', alpha=0.7, label='Low threshold')
ax1.axvline(x=1800, color='red', linestyle='--', alpha=0.7, label='High threshold')
ax1.legend()
ax1.grid(True, alpha=0.3, axis='x')

for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars1, concentration_df['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'])):
    ax1.text(value, i, f' {value:.0f}', va='center', fontsize=10)

# Top3å æ¯”
ax2 = axes[1]
bars2 = ax2.barh(concentration_df['è¡Œä¸š'], concentration_df['Top3å æ¯”(%)'], color='steelblue')
ax2.set_xlabel('Percentage (%)', fontsize=12)
ax2.set_title('Top 3 Destinations Share', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold')
ax2.axvline(x=50, color='orange', linestyle='--', alpha=0.7, label='50% reference')
ax2.legend()
ax2.grid(True, alpha=0.3, axis='x')

for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars2, concentration_df['Top3å æ¯”(%)'])):
    ax2.text(value, i, f' {value:.1f}%', va='center', fontsize=10)

plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig('3_æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦åˆ†æ.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
plt.close()

print("   âœ… 3_æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦åˆ†æ.png")

    ax.set_title(f'{industry} - Top 10 Investors', fontsize=13, fontweight='bold')
    
    for i, (bar, value) in enumerate(zip(bars, investor_stats['æŠ•èµ„é¢'])):
        ax.text(value, i, f' ${value:,.0f}M', va='center', fontsize=8)
    
    ax.grid(True, alpha=0.3, axis='x')

fig.delaxes(axes[5])
plt.tight_layout()

training_content.append("ä¸­å›½ä¼ä¸šæµ·å¤–æŠ•èµ„ - è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„åœ°å›¾ä¸é£é™©åˆ†ææ¡†æ¶")

training_content.append("")

for industry in industries:
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    training_content.append("\n" + "="*60)
    training_content.append(f"ã€{industry}ã€‘")
    training_content.append("="*60)
    
    total_amount = industry_df['Amount'].sum()
    total_projects = len(industry_df)
    avg_amount = industry_df['Amount'].mean()
    
    training_content.append(f"\nä¸€ã€æŠ•èµ„æ¦‚å†µ")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ å†å²æŠ•èµ„æ€»é¢: ${total_amount:,.0f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ æŠ•èµ„é¡¹ç›®æ•°: {total_projects} ä¸ª")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ å¹³å‡å•ç¬”æŠ•èµ„: ${avg_amount:,.0f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
    
    # Top 5ç›®çš„åœ°
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].agg(['sum', 'count']).sort_values('sum', ascending=False).head(5)
    total_country_amount = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].sum().sum()
    
    training_content.append(f"\näºŒã€ä¸»è¦æŠ•èµ„ç›®çš„åœ°ï¼ˆTop 5ï¼‰")
    for idx, (country, row) in enumerate(country_stats.iterrows(), 1):
        percentage = (row['sum'] / total_country_amount * 100) if total_country_amount > 0 else 0
        training_content.append(f"  {idx}. {country}")
        training_content.append(f"     æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${row['sum']:,.0f}M ({percentage:.1f}%) | é¡¹ç›®æ•°: {int(row['count'])}")
    
    # é›†ä¸­åº¦
    conc_row = concentration_df[concentration_df['è¡Œä¸š'] == industry]
    if len(conc_row) > 0:
        conc_row = conc_row.iloc[0]
        training_content.append(f"\nä¸‰ã€æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦")
        concentration_level = 'é«˜' if conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'] > 1800 else 'ä¸­' if conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'] > 1000 else 'ä½'
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ HHIæŒ‡æ•°: {conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°']:.0f} ({concentration_level}é›†ä¸­åº¦)")
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ Top3å›½å®¶å æ¯”: {conc_row['Top3å æ¯”(%)']:.1f}%")
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ€»æ•°: {int(conc_row['æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ•°'])}")
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ é£é™©æç¤º: {'æŠ•èµ„è¿‡äºé›†ä¸­ï¼Œåœ°ç¼˜æ”¿æ²»é£é™©è¾ƒé«˜' if concentration_level == 'é«˜' else 'æŠ•èµ„ç›¸å¯¹åˆ†æ•£' if concentration_level == 'ä½' else 'æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦é€‚ä¸­'}")
    
    # å…¸å‹æŠ•èµ„å¯¹è±¡
    training_content.append(f"\nå››ã€å…¸å‹æŠ•èµ„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆPartner/Targetï¼‰")
    partner_stats = industry_df[industry_df['Partner/Target'].notna()].nlargest(3, 'Amount')[['Partner/Target', 'Amount', 'Country', 'Year']]
    for idx, row in partner_stats.iterrows():
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ {row['Partner/Target'][:50]}")
        training_content.append(f"    é‡‘é¢: ${row['Amount']:,.0f}M | å›½å®¶: {row['Country']} | å¹´ä»½: {int(row['Year'])}")
    
    training_content.append(f"\näº”ã€å…¸å‹é£é™©ç±»å‹ï¼ˆè¯·æ ¹æ®ç›®çš„åœ°è¡¥å……ï¼‰")
    training_content.append(f"  é’ˆå¯¹ä¸»è¦ç›®çš„åœ°çš„é£é™©åˆ†æï¼š")
    for idx, (country, row) in enumerate(country_stats.head(3).iterrows(), 1):
        training_content.append(f"\n  {idx}. {country}")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] åœ°ç¼˜æ”¿æ²»é£é™©: ____________")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] ç›‘ç®¡åˆè§„é£é™©: ____________")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] æŠ€æœ¯/çŸ¥è¯†äº§æƒé£é™©: ____________")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] å…¶ä»–é£é™©: ____________")
    
    training_content.append(f"\nå…­ã€å…¸å‹æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼ˆå¾…è¡¥å……ï¼‰")
    training_content.append(f"  æ¡ˆä¾‹1ï¼šæˆåŠŸæ¡ˆä¾‹")
    training_content.append(f"    - æ¡ˆä¾‹åç§°: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - æŠ•èµ„æ–¹: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - ç›®æ ‡æ–¹: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - æŠ•èµ„é‡‘é¢: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - å…³é”®æˆåŠŸå› ç´ : ____________")
    training_content.append(f"  ")
    training_content.append(f"  æ¡ˆä¾‹2ï¼šå¤±è´¥/æŒ‘æˆ˜æ¡ˆä¾‹")
    training_content.append(f"    - æ¡ˆä¾‹åç§°: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - é‡åˆ°çš„ä¸»è¦é£é™©: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"    - ç»éªŒæ•™è®­: ____________")
    training_content.append("")

with open('6_åŸ¹è®­è®²ä¹‰æ¡†æ¶.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:

<details><summary>Tool use: **command** â€¢ Run command: cd /Users/qrebecca/china_investment_tracker && python3 << 'PYEOF'
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib
matplotlib.use('Agg')  # ä½¿ç”¨éäº¤äº’å¼åç«¯
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

print("å¼€å§‹æ•°æ®å¤„ç†...")

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
df = pd.read_csv('china_investment_tracker.csv')
df['Amount'] = df['Millions'].str.replace('$', '', regex=False).str.replace(',', '').str.strip()
df['Amount'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Amount'], errors='coerce')

# å®šä¹‰è¡Œä¸šå…³é”®è¯
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'hospital', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['ai', 'artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'software'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'car', 'vehicle', 'byd'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_industry(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matched = []
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matched.append(industry)
                break
    return matched if matched else []

df['Industries'] = df.apply(classify_industry, axis=1)
df_expanded = df.explode('Industries')
df_expanded = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'].notna()]

industries = list(industry_keywords.keys())

print(f"âœ… æ•°æ®å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ: {len(df_expanded)} æ¡è¡Œä¸šè®°å½•")

# å…ˆç”ŸæˆExcelæ•°æ®
print("\nç”ŸæˆExcelæ•°æ®è¡¨...")

concentration_data = []
for industry in industries:
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].sum().sort_values(ascending=False)
    total_amount = country_stats.sum()
    
    if total_amount > 0:
        shares = (country_stats / total_amount * 100)
        hhi = (shares ** 2).sum()
        top3_share = shares.head(3).sum()
        top5_share = shares.head(5).sum()
        
        concentration_data.append({
            'è¡Œä¸š': industry,
            'HHIæŒ‡æ•°': hhi,
            'Top3å æ¯”(%)': top3_share,
            'Top5å æ¯”(%)': top5_share,
            'æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ•°': len(country_stats),
            'ç¬¬ä¸€ç›®çš„åœ°': country_stats.index[0] if len(country_stats) > 0 else '',
            'ç¬¬ä¸€å æ¯”(%)': shares.iloc[0] if len(shares) > 0 else 0
        })

concentration_df = pd.DataFrame(concentration_data)

# å¯¼å‡ºExcel
with pd.ExcelWriter('å„è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ®.xlsx', engine='openpyxl') as writer:
    concentration_df.to_excel(writer, sheet_name='æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦æ±‡æ€»', index=False)
    
    for industry in industries:
        industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry].copy()
        export_cols = ['Year', 'Month', 'Investor', 'Amount', 'Partner/Target', 
                      'Country', 'Region', 'Sector', 'Subsector', 'BRI']
        industry_export = industry_df[export_cols].sort_values('Amount', ascending=False)
        sheet_name = industry[:30]
        industry_export.to_excel(writer, sheet_name=sheet_name, index=False)

print("âœ… Excelæ–‡ä»¶ç”ŸæˆæˆåŠŸ: å„è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ®.xlsx")

print("\nç”ŸæˆåŸ¹è®­è®²ä¹‰æ¡†æ¶...")

training_content = []
training_content.append("="*80)
training_content.append("ä¸­å›½ä¼ä¸šæµ·å¤–æŠ•èµ„ - è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„åœ°å›¾ä¸é£é™©åˆ†ææ¡†æ¶")
training_content.append("="*80)
training_content.append("")

for industry in industries:
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    training_content.append("\n" + "="*60)
    training_content.append(f"ã€{industry}ã€‘")
    training_content.append("="*60)
    
    total_amount = industry_df['Amount'].sum()
    total_projects = len(industry_df)
    avg_amount = industry_df['Amount'].mean() if total_projects > 0 else 0
    
    training_content.append(f"\nä¸€ã€æŠ•èµ„æ¦‚å†µ")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ å†å²æŠ•èµ„æ€»é¢: ${total_amount:,.0f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ æŠ•èµ„é¡¹ç›®æ•°: {total_projects} ä¸ª")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ å¹³å‡å•ç¬”æŠ•èµ„: ${avg_amount:,.0f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
    
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].agg(['sum', 'count']).sort_values('sum', ascending=False).head(5)
    total_country_amount = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].sum().sum()
    
    training_content.append(f"\näºŒã€ä¸»è¦æŠ•èµ„ç›®çš„åœ°ï¼ˆTop 5ï¼‰")
    for idx, (country, row) in enumerate(country_stats.iterrows(), 1):
        percentage = (row['sum'] / total_country_amount * 100) if total_country_amount > 0 else 0
        training_content.append(f"  {idx}. {country}")
        training_content.append(f"     æŠ•èµ„é¢: ${row['sum']:,.0f}M ({percentage:.1f}%) | é¡¹ç›®æ•°: {int(row['count'])}")
    
    conc_row = concentration_df[concentration_df['è¡Œä¸š'] == industry]
    if len(conc_row) > 0:
        conc_row = conc_row.iloc[0]
        training_content.append(f"\nä¸‰ã€æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦")
        concentration_level = 'é«˜' if conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'] > 1800 else 'ä¸­' if conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°'] > 1000 else 'ä½'
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ HHIæŒ‡æ•°: {conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°']:.0f} ({concentration_level}é›†ä¸­åº¦)")
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ Top3å›½å®¶å æ¯”: {conc_row['Top3å æ¯”(%)']:.1f}%")
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ€»æ•°: {int(conc_row['æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ•°'])}")
    
    training_content.append(f"\nå››ã€å…¸å‹æŠ•èµ„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆPartner/Targetï¼‰")
    partner_stats = industry_df[industry_df['Partner/Target'].notna()].nlargest(3, 'Amount')[['Partner/Target', 'Amount', 'Country', 'Year']]
    for idx, row in partner_stats.iterrows():
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ {row['Partner/Target'][:50]}")
        training_content.append(f"    é‡‘é¢: ${row['Amount']:,.0f}M | å›½å®¶: {row['Country']} | å¹´ä»½: {int(row['Year'])}")
    
    training_content.append(f"\näº”ã€å…¸å‹é£é™©ç±»å‹ï¼ˆè¯·æ ¹æ®ç›®çš„åœ°è¡¥å……ï¼‰")
    for idx, (country, row) in enumerate(country_stats.head(3).iterrows(), 1):
        training_content.append(f"\n  {idx}. {country}")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] åœ°ç¼˜æ”¿æ²»é£é™©: ____________")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] ç›‘ç®¡åˆè§„é£é™©: ____________")
        training_content.append(f"     [ ] æŠ€æœ¯/çŸ¥è¯†äº§æƒé£é™©: ____________")
    
    training_content.append(f"\nå…­ã€å…¸å‹æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼ˆå¾…è¡¥å……ï¼‰")
    training_content.append(f"  [ ] æˆåŠŸæ¡ˆä¾‹: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"  [ ] å¤±è´¥/æŒ‘æˆ˜æ¡ˆä¾‹: ____________")
    training_content.append("")

with open('åŸ¹è®­è®²ä¹‰æ¡†æ¶.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    f.write('\n'.join(training_content))

print("âœ… æ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶ç”ŸæˆæˆåŠŸ: åŸ¹è®­è®²ä¹‰æ¡†æ¶.txt")

```bash

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib
matplotlib.use('Agg')  # ä½¿ç”¨éäº¤äº’å¼åç«¯
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

print("å¼€å§‹æ•°æ®å¤„ç†...")

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
df = pd.read_csv('china_investment_tracker.csv')
df['Amount'] = df['Millions'].str.replace('$', '', regex=False).str.replace(',', '').str.strip()
df['Amount'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Amount'], errors='coerce')

# å®šä¹‰è¡Œä¸šå…³é”®è¯
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'hospital', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['ai', 'artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'software'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'car', 'vehicle', 'byd'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_industry(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matched = []
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matched.append(industry)
                break
    return matched if matched else []

df['Industries'] = df.apply(classify_industry, axis=1)
df_expanded = df.explode('Industries')
df_expanded = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'].notna()]

industries = list(industry_keywords.keys())

print(f"âœ… æ•°æ®å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ: {len(df_expanded)} æ¡è¡Œä¸šè®°å½•")

# å…ˆç”ŸæˆExcelæ•°æ®
print("\nç”ŸæˆExcelæ•°æ®è¡¨...")

concentration_data = []
for industry in industries:
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    country_stats = industry_df.groupby('Country')['Amount'].sum().sort_values(ascending=False)
    total_amount = country_stats.sum()
    
    if total_amount > 0:
        shares = (country_stats / total_amount * 100)
        hhi = (shares ** 2).sum()
        top3_share = shares.head(3).sum()
        top5_share = shares.head(5).sum()
        
        concentration_data.append({
            'è¡Œä¸š': industry,
            'HHIæŒ‡æ•°': hhi,
            'Top3å æ¯”(%)': top3_share,
            'Top5å æ¯”(%)': top5_share,
            'æŠ•èµ„å›½å®¶æ•°': len(country_stats),
            'ç¬¬ä¸€ç›®çš„åœ°': country_stats.index[0] if len(country_stats) > 0 else '',
            'ç¬¬ä¸€å æ¯”(%)': shares.iloc[0] if len(shares) > 0 else 0
        })

concentration_df = pd.DataFrame(concentration_data)

# å¯¼å‡ºExcel
with pd.ExcelWriter('å„è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ®.xlsx', engine='openpyxl') as writer:
    concentration_df.to_excel(writer, sheet_name='æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦æ±‡æ€»', index=False)
    
    for industry in industries:
        industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry].copy()
        export_cols = ['Year', 'Month', 'Investor', 'Amount', 'Partner/Target', 
                      'Country', 'Region', 'Sector', 'Subsector', 'BRI']
        industry_export = industry_df[export_cols].sort_values('Amount', ascending=False)
        sheet_name = industry[:30]
        industry_export.to_excel(writer, sheet_name=sheet_name, index=False)

print("âœ… Excelæ–‡ä»¶ç”ŸæˆæˆåŠŸ: å„è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ®.xlsx")

# ç”ŸæˆåŸ¹è®­è®²ä¹‰
print("\nç”ŸæˆåŸ¹è®­è®²ä¹‰æ¡†æ¶...")

training_content = []
training_content.append("="*80)
training_content.append("ä¸­å›½ä¼ä¸šæµ·å¤–æŠ•èµ„ - è¡Œä¸šæŠ•èµ„åœ°å›¾ä¸é£é™©åˆ†ææ¡†æ¶")
training_content.append("="*80)
training_content.append("")

for industry in industries:
    industry_df = df_expanded[df_expanded['Industries'] == industry]
    
    training_content.append("\n" + "="*60)
    training_content.append(f"ã€{industry}ã€‘")
    training_content.append("="*60)
    
    total_amount = industry_df['Amount'].sum()
    total_projects = len(industry_df)
    avg_amount = industry_df['Amount'].mean() if total_projects > 0 else 0
    
    training_content.append(f"\nä¸€ã€æŠ•èµ„æ¦‚å†µ")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ å†å²æŠ•èµ„æ€»é¢: ${total_amount:,.0f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ æŠ•èµ„é¡¹ç›®æ•°: {total_projects} ä¸ª")
    training_content.append(f"  â€¢ å¹³å‡å•ç¬”æŠ•èµ„: ${avg_amount:,.0f} ç™¾ä¸‡ç¾å…ƒ")

    conc_row = concentration_df[concentration_df['è¡Œä¸š'] == industry]
    if len(conc_row) > 0:
        conc_row = conc_row.iloc[0]
        training_content.append(f"\nä¸‰ã€æŠ•èµ„é›†ä¸­åº¦")

        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ HHIæŒ‡æ•°: {conc_row['HHIæŒ‡æ•°']:.0f} ({concentration_level}é›†ä¸­åº¦)")

    training_content.append(f"\nå››ã€å…¸å‹æŠ•èµ„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆPartner/Targetï¼‰")
    partner_stats = industry_df[industry_df['Partner/Target'].notna()].nlargest(3, 'Amount')[['Partner/Target', 'Amount', 'Country', 'Year']]
    for idx, row in partner_stats.iterrows():
        training_content.append(f"  â€¢ {row['Partner/Target'][:50]}")
        training_content.append(f"    é‡‘é¢: ${row['Amount']:,.0f}M | å›½å®¶: {row['Country']} | å¹´ä»½: {int(row['Year'])}")

        training_content.append(f"     [ ] æŠ€æœ¯/çŸ¥è¯†äº§æƒé£é™©: ____________")
    
    training_content.append(f"\nå…­ã€å…¸å‹æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼ˆå¾…è¡¥å……ï¼‰")
    training_content.append(f"  [ ] æˆåŠŸæ¡ˆä¾‹: ____________")
    training_content.append(f"  [ ] å¤±è´¥/æŒ‘æˆ˜æ¡ˆä¾‹: ____________")

with open('åŸ¹è®­è®²ä¹‰æ¡†æ¶.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_and_explain(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matches = {}
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matches[industry] = keyword
                break
    return matches

# ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šæ”¶é›†æ¡ˆä¾‹

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
with open('china_investment_tracker.csv', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    reader = csv.DictReader(f)
    data = list(reader)

# å®šä¹‰å…³é”®è¯
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'hospital', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['ai', 'artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'software'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'car', 'vehicle', 'byd'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_and_explain(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matches = {}
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matches[industry] = keyword
                break
    return matches

# ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šæ”¶é›†æ¡ˆä¾‹
industry_examples = {industry: [] for industry in industry_keywords.keys()}

for row in data:
    matches = classify_and_explain(row)
    for industry, matched_keyword in matches.items():
        try:
            amount = float(row['Millions'].replace('$', '').replace(',', '').strip())
            industry_examples[industry].append({
                'year': row['Year'],
                'investor': row['Investor'],
                'target': row['Partner/Target'],
                'amount': amount,
                'country': row['Country'],
                'sector': row['Sector'],
                'subsector': row['Subsector'],
                'matched_keyword': matched_keyword
            })
        except:
            pass

<details><summary>Tool use: **command** â€¢ Run command: cd /Users/qrebecca/china_investment_tracker && python3 << 'PYEOF'
import csv
import pandas as pd

print("ç”Ÿæˆå„è¡Œä¸šè¯¦ç»†é¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•...")

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
df = pd.read_csv('china_investment_tracker.csv')

# æ¸…æ´—é‡‘é¢
df['Amount'] = df['Millions'].str.replace('$', '', regex=False).str.replace(',', '').str.strip()
df['Amount'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Amount'], errors='coerce')

# å®šä¹‰å…³é”®è¯
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'hospital', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['ai', 'artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'software'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'car', 'vehicle', 'byd'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_and_explain(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matches = {}
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matches[industry] = keyword
                break
    return matches

# ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šåˆ›å»ºè¯¦ç»†åˆ—è¡¨
for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
    industry_data = []
    
    for idx, row in df.iterrows():
        matches = classify_and_explain(row)
        if industry in matches:
            industry_data.append({
                'Year': row['Year'],
                'Month': row['Month'],
                'Investor': row['Investor'],
                'Amount': row['Amount'],
                'Partner/Target': row['Partner/Target'],
                'Country': row['Country'],
                'Region': row['Region'],
                'Sector': row['Sector'],
                'Subsector': row['Subsector'],
                'BRI': row['BRI'],
                'Matched_Keyword': matches[industry]
            })
    
    # åˆ›å»ºDataFrameå¹¶æ’åº
    industry_df = pd.DataFrame(industry_data)
    industry_df = industry_df.sort_values('Amount', ascending=False)
    
    # ä¿å­˜åˆ°CSV
    filename = f'é¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•_{industry}.csv'
    industry_df.to_csv(filename, index=False, encoding='utf-8-sig')
    
    print(f"âœ… {industry}: {len(industry_df)} ä¸ªé¡¹ç›® â†’ {filename}")

# ç”Ÿæˆæ±‡æ€»Excel
print("\nç”Ÿæˆæ±‡æ€»Excelæ–‡ä»¶...")
with pd.ExcelWriter('å„è¡Œä¸šé¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•æ±‡æ€».xlsx', engine='openpyxl') as writer:
    for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
        industry_data = []
        
        for idx, row in df.iterrows():
            matches = classify_and_explain(row)
            if industry in matches:
                industry_data.append({
                    'Year': row['Year'],
                    'Month': row['Month'],
                    'Investor': row['Investor'],
                    'Amount_Million_USD': row['Amount'],
                    'Partner_Target': row['Partner/Target'],
                    'Country': row['Country'],
                    'Region': row['Region'],
                    'Sector': row['Sector'],
                    'Subsector': row['Subsector'],
                    'BRI': row['BRI'],
                    'Matched_Keyword': matches[industry]
                })
        
        industry_df = pd.DataFrame(industry_data)
        industry_df = industry_df.sort_values('Amount_Million_USD', ascending=False)

import csv
import pandas as pd

print("ç”Ÿæˆå„è¡Œä¸šè¯¦ç»†é¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•...")

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
df = pd.read_csv('china_investment_tracker.csv')

# æ¸…æ´—é‡‘é¢
df['Amount'] = df['Millions'].str.replace('$', '', regex=False).str.replace(',', '').str.strip()
df['Amount'] = pd.to_numeric(df['Amount'], errors='coerce')

# å®šä¹‰å…³é”®è¯
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'hospital', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['ai', 'artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'software'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'car', 'vehicle', 'byd'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# åˆ†ç±»å‡½æ•°
def classify_and_explain(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matches = {}
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matches[industry] = keyword
                break
    return matches

# ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šåˆ›å»ºè¯¦ç»†åˆ—è¡¨
for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
    industry_data = []
    
    for idx, row in df.iterrows():
        matches = classify_and_explain(row)
        if industry in matches:
            industry_data.append({
                'Year': row['Year'],
                'Month': row['Month'],
                'Investor': row['Investor'],
                'Amount': row['Amount'],
                'Partner/Target': row['Partner/Target'],
                'Country': row['Country'],
                'Region': row['Region'],
                'Sector': row['Sector'],
                'Subsector': row['Subsector'],
                'BRI': row['BRI'],
                'Matched_Keyword': matches[industry]
            })
    
    # åˆ›å»ºDataFrameå¹¶æ’åº
    industry_df = pd.DataFrame(industry_data)
    industry_df = industry_df.sort_values('Amount', ascending=False)
    
    # ä¿å­˜åˆ°CSV
    filename = f'é¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•_{industry}.csv'
    industry_df.to_csv(filename, index=False, encoding='utf-8-sig')
    
    print(f"âœ… {industry}: {len(industry_df)} ä¸ªé¡¹ç›® â†’ {filename}")

# ç”Ÿæˆæ±‡æ€»Excel
print("\nç”Ÿæˆæ±‡æ€»Excelæ–‡ä»¶...")
with pd.ExcelWriter('å„è¡Œä¸šé¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•æ±‡æ€».xlsx', engine='openpyxl') as writer:
    for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
        industry_data = []
        
        for idx, row in df.iterrows():
            matches = classify_and_explain(row)
            if industry in matches:
                industry_data.append({
                    'Year': row['Year'],
                    'Month': row['Month'],
                    'Investor': row['Investor'],
                    'Amount_Million_USD': row['Amount'],
                    'Partner_Target': row['Partner/Target'],
                    'Country': row['Country'],
                    'Region': row['Region'],
                    'Sector': row['Sector'],
                    'Subsector': row['Subsector'],
                    'BRI': row['BRI'],
                    'Matched_Keyword': matches[industry]
                })
        
        industry_df = pd.DataFrame(industry_data)
        industry_df = industry_df.sort_values('Amount_Million_USD', ascending=False)
        
        # å·¥ä½œè¡¨åç§°
        sheet_name = industry[:30]
        industry_df.to_excel(writer, sheet_name=sheet_name, index=False)

print(f"âœ… æ±‡æ€»æ–‡ä»¶: å„è¡Œä¸šé¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•æ±‡æ€».xlsx")

    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'ic ', 'integrated circuit', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker'],

    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()

    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matches[industry] = keyword
                break
    return matches

        writer.writeheader()

        for row in data:

                except:
                    amount = 0

                    'Year': row['Year'],
                    'Month': row['Month'],

import csv

print("="*80)
print("ç”Ÿæˆæ›´å‡†ç¡®çš„è¡Œä¸šåˆ†ç±»ï¼ˆå»é™¤è™šé«˜ï¼‰")
print("="*80)

# è¯»å–æ•°æ®
with open('china_investment_tracker.csv', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
    reader = csv.DictReader(f)
    data = list(reader)

# é‡æ–°å®šä¹‰å…³é”®è¯ - æ›´ä¸¥æ ¼çš„åŒ¹é…è§„åˆ™
industry_keywords = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': ['semiconductor', 'chip', 'wafer', 'foundry', 'chipmaker', 'integrated circuit'],
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['pharma', 'biotech', 'drug', 'medicine', 'healthcare', 'medical', 'clinic', 'vaccine', 'therapeutic'],
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': ['artificial intelligence', 'machine learning', 'deep learning', 'neural network', 'computer vision'],
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['electric vehicle', 'ev ', 'battery', 'auto', 'automotive', 'vehicle'],
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['mining', 'mineral', 'copper', 'lithium', 'iron ore', 'cobalt', 'nickel', 'zinc', 'gold', 'silver', 'coal', 'metal']
}

# æ’é™¤è¯åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆé˜²æ­¢è¯¯åŒ¹é…ï¼‰
exclude_patterns = {
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': ['hospitality'],  # æ’é™¤é…’åº—ä¸š
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': ['carlson', 'carmike', 'carrefour'],  # æ’é™¤é…’åº—ã€å½±é™¢ã€è¶…å¸‚
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': ['goldman']  # æ’é™¤é«˜ç››ï¼ˆè™½ç„¶åŒ…å«goldï¼‰
}

def classify_accurate(row):
    text = (str(row.get('Sector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Subsector', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Partner/Target', '')) + ' ' + 
            str(row.get('Investor', ''))).lower()
    
    matches = {}
    
    for industry, keywords in industry_keywords.items():
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ’é™¤è¯
        should_exclude = False
        if industry in exclude_patterns:
            for exclude_word in exclude_patterns[industry]:
                if exclude_word in text:
                    should_exclude = True
                    break
        
        if should_exclude:
            continue
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥å…³é”®è¯
        for keyword in keywords:
            if keyword in text:
                matches[industry] = keyword
                break
    
    return matches

# ç»Ÿè®¡æ–°çš„åˆ†ç±»ç»“æœ
print("\nç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šç»Ÿè®¡å„è¡Œä¸šé¡¹ç›®æ•°ï¼ˆæ–°åˆ†ç±»ï¼‰")
print("-"*80)

industry_counts = {industry: 0 for industry in industry_keywords.keys()}
industry_projects = {industry: [] for industry in industry_keywords.keys()}

for row in data:
    matches = classify_accurate(row)
    for industry in matches:
        industry_counts[industry] += 1
        try:
            amount = float(row['Millions'].replace('$', '').replace(',', '').strip())
        except:
            amount = 0
        industry_projects[industry].append({
            'row': row,
            'amount': amount,
            'keyword': matches[industry]
        })

print("\nå¯¹æ¯”ç»“æœï¼š")
print(f"{'è¡Œä¸š':<12} {'æ—§åˆ†ç±»':<10} {'æ–°åˆ†ç±»':<10} {'å‡å°‘':<10} {'è¯´æ˜'}")
print("-"*80)

old_counts = {
    'é›†æˆç”µè·¯': 50,
    'ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯': 32,
    'äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½': 320,
    'æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦': 249,
    'çŸ¿äº§èµ„æº': 416
}

for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
    old = old_counts[industry]
    new = industry_counts[industry]
    diff = old - new
    diff_pct = (diff / old * 100) if old > 0 else 0
    
    if diff > 0:
        note = f"å»é™¤äº†{diff}ä¸ªè¯¯åˆ†ç±»é¡¹ç›® (-{diff_pct:.0f}%)"
    elif diff < 0:
        note = "ç•¥æœ‰å¢åŠ "
    else:
        note = "æ— å˜åŒ–"
    
    print(f"{industry:<12} {old:<10} {new:<10} {diff:<10} {note}")

# ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„CSVæ–‡ä»¶
print("\n\nç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šç”Ÿæˆå‡†ç¡®çš„é¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•CSV")
print("-"*80)

for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
    filename = f'å‡†ç¡®æ¸…å•_{industry}.csv'
    
    # æŒ‰é‡‘é¢æ’åº
    projects = sorted(industry_projects[industry], key=lambda x: x['amount'], reverse=True)
    
    with open(filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8-sig', newline='') as f:
        fieldnames = ['Year', 'Month', 'Investor', 'Amount_USD_Million', 'Partner_Target', 
                     'Country', 'Region', 'Sector', 'Subsector', 'BRI', 'Matched_Keyword']
        writer = csv.DictWriter(f, fieldnames=fieldnames)
        writer.writeheader()
        
        for project in projects:
            row = project['row']
            writer.writerow({
                'Year': row['Year'],
                'Month': row['Month'],
                'Investor': row['Investor'],
                'Amount_USD_Million': project['amount'],
                'Partner_Target': row['Partner/Target'],
                'Country': row['Country'],
                'Region': row['Region'],
                'Sector': row['Sector'],
                'Subsector': row['Subsector'],
                'BRI': row['BRI'],
                'Matched_Keyword': project['keyword']
            })
    
    print(f"âœ… {industry}: {len(projects)} ä¸ªé¡¹ç›® â†’ {filename}")

# å±•ç¤ºæ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šçš„Top 10
print("\n\nç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ï¼šå±•ç¤ºå„è¡Œä¸šTop 10é¡¹ç›®ï¼ˆéªŒè¯å‡†ç¡®æ€§ï¼‰")
print("="*80)

for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
    projects = sorted(industry_projects[industry], key=lambda x: x['amount'], reverse=True)[:10]
    
    print(f"\nã€{industry}ã€‘- Top 10")
    print("-"*70)
    
    for idx, project in enumerate(projects, 1):
        row = project['row']
        print(f"{idx:2d}. ${project['amount']:>8,.0f}M | {row['Year']} | {row['Country']:<20}")
        print(f"    æŠ•èµ„æ–¹: {row['Investor'][:50]}")
        print(f"    ç›®æ ‡æ–¹: {row['Partner/Target'][:50]}")
        print(f"    åŸå§‹è¡Œä¸š: {row['Sector']}/{row['Subsector']}")
        print(f"    âœ“ åŒ¹é…: '{project['keyword']}'")
        print()

print("\n" + "="*80)
print("âœ… å‡†ç¡®åˆ†ç±»å®Œæˆï¼")
print("="*80)
print("\nè¯´æ˜ï¼š")
print("  1. åˆ é™¤äº†'ic 'å…³é”®è¯ â†’ é›†æˆç”µè·¯ä»50é¡¹å‡å°‘åˆ°çœŸå®çš„åŠå¯¼ä½“é¡¹ç›®")
print("  2. åˆ é™¤äº†'ai'å’Œ'software' â†’ äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½å¤§å¹…å‡å°‘è™šé«˜")
print("  3. æ’é™¤'hospitality' â†’ ç”Ÿç‰©åŒ»è¯å»é™¤é…’åº—ä¸š")
print("  4. æ’é™¤'carlson/carmike' â†’ æ–°èƒ½æºæ±½è½¦å»é™¤å½±é™¢/é…’åº—")
print("  5. çŸ¿äº§èµ„æºä¿æŒä¸å˜ â†’ æœ¬èº«å°±å¾ˆå‡†ç¡®")
print("="*80)

    print(f"{industry:<12} {old:<10} {new:<10} {diff:<10} {note}")

# ç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„CSVæ–‡ä»¶
print("\n\nç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šç”Ÿæˆå‡†ç¡®çš„é¡¹ç›®æ¸…å•CSV")
print("-"*80)

for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
    filename = f'å‡†ç¡®æ¸…å•_{industry}.csv'
    
    # æŒ‰é‡‘é¢æ’åº
    projects = sorted(industry_projects[industry], key=lambda x: x['amount'], reverse=True)
    
    with open(filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8-sig', newline='') as f:
        fieldnames = ['Year', 'Month', 'Investor', 'Amount_USD_Million', 'Partner_Target', 
                     'Country', 'Region', 'Sector', 'Subsector', 'BRI', 'Matched_Keyword']
        writer = csv.DictWriter(f, fieldnames=fieldnames)
        writer.writeheader()
        
        for project in projects:
            row = project['row']
            writer.writerow({
                'Year': row['Year'],
                'Month': row['Month'],
                'Investor': row['Investor'],
                'Amount_USD_Million': project['amount'],
                'Partner_Target': row['Partner/Target'],
                'Country': row['Country'],
                'Region': row['Region'],
                'Sector': row['Sector'],
                'Subsector': row['Subsector'],
                'BRI': row['BRI'],
                'Matched_Keyword': project['keyword']
            })
    
    print(f"âœ… {industry}: {len(projects)} ä¸ªé¡¹ç›® â†’ {filename}")

# å±•ç¤ºæ¯ä¸ªè¡Œä¸šçš„Top 10
print("\n\nç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ï¼šå±•ç¤ºå„è¡Œä¸šTop 10é¡¹ç›®ï¼ˆéªŒè¯å‡†ç¡®æ€§ï¼‰")
print("="*80)

for industry in industry_keywords.keys():
    projects = sorted(industry_projects[industry], key=lambda x: x['amount'], reverse=True)[:10]
    
    print(f"\nã€{industry}ã€‘- Top 10")
    print("-"*70)
    
    for idx, project in enumerate(projects, 1):
        row = project['row']
        print(f"{idx:2d}. ${project['amount']:>8,.0f}M | {row['Year']} | {row['Country']:<20}")
        print(f"    æŠ•èµ„æ–¹: {row['Investor'][:50]}")
        print(f"    ç›®æ ‡æ–¹: {row['Partner/Target'][:50]}")
        print(f"    åŸå§‹è¡Œä¸š: {row['Sector']}/{row['Subsector']}")
        print(f"    âœ“ åŒ¹é…: '{project['keyword']}'")
        print()

print("\n" + "="*80)
print("âœ… å‡†ç¡®åˆ†ç±»å®Œæˆï¼")
